description.@en: A dim mote of light spreads across a surface, creating a glimmering polish.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the object or person you touch is instantly cleaned, spick and span. This spell washes dirt away, removes stains, eliminates odors and produces a lemon-like scent. It can even make spoiled foods or despoiled water taste good.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but it can affect a number of objects or persons equal to your [WB].

criticalFailure.@en: Tiny motes of darkness wash over the objects and persons you touched. They emerge dirty, grimy and stinking of a fetid odor that makes you vomit! You immediately suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] physical Peril.

system.distance: Any one object or person you can touch
